entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as having a cabin on the edge of the Forbidden Forest. He is also referred to as 'Professor Grubbly-Plank stood waiting for the class some ten yards from Hagrid's front door'.

entities.name: professor grubbly-plank
entities.description: Professor Grubbly-Plank is mentioned as standing waiting for the class, and having a long trestle table laden with twigs.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as walking down the sloping lawn toward Hagrid's cabin, and being the subject of a joke made by Draco Malfoy.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as walking down the sloping lawn toward Hagrid's cabin with Harry.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is mentioned as making a joke about Harry, and being surrounded by his gang of Slytherin cronies.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as laughing at Draco Malfoy's joke, and being part of the group of Slytherin students surrounding him.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as laughing at Draco Malfoy's joke, and being part of the group of Slytherin students surrounding him.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is mentioned as laughing at Draco Malfoy's joke, and being part of the group of Slytherin students surrounding him.

relationships.description: Professor Grubbly-Plank is standing near Hagrid's front door.
Draco Malfoy makes a joke about Harry, and his gang of Slytherin students laugh at it.
